title: Data Types
description: This level will test your knowledge on data types in Python.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = 5
questions.hint: The value of variable x is a whole number.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = 2.1
questions.hint: The value of variable x is a decimal number.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = 'hello'
questions.hint: The value of variable x contains only letters.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = True
questions.hint: The value of variable x is True.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = ['apple', 'banana', 'apple']
questions.hint: The variable x stores multiple items with duplicate vlaues.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = {'name' : 'John', 'age' : 36}
questions.hint: The variable x stores data values in key:value pairs.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = {'apple', 'banana', 'cherry'}
questions.hint: The variable x stores multiple items without duplicate values. Curly brackets.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = ('apple', 'banana', 'cherry')
questions.hint: The variable x stores multiple items in a single variable which are ordered and unchangeable. Round brackets.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = '5.7'
questions.hint: The value of variable x is surrounded with quotation marks.

questions.question: What is this data type:  x = false
questions.hint: The value of variable x is False.
